reviewText:
I showed  this to my Firsties and they begged to see it over and over. We had just finished our unit on ocean animals.
I enjoy these, too! They are fast paced and use lots of
unexpected humor and music. It lasts 20-25 minutes.
Bought this for my 6 year old's for their birthday and it was nice to rewatch Bill Nye!  They seemed to like it too since they love science!

Pretty much All the Bill Nye Videos are great and my kids love them.
Watch them over and over and actually learn information unlike most other school type videos.
It's great that science and knowledge is finally COOL and society is finally drifting away from ignorance and stupidity.

Although, nekton and benthos are neglected--he loves plankton! And the music video is so cute!
Love how he explains plankton and drifters!
this is a great video, kids love bill nye.  great information and very well delivered.  what can you say, bill nye IS the science guy
